thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ikang Enters Into Definitive Merger Agreement For Going Private Transaction

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ikang Enters Into Definitive Merger Agreement For Going Private Transaction
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Ikang Healthcare Group Inc:
* IKANG ENTERS INTO DEFINITIVE MERGER AGREEMENT FOR GOING PRIVATE TRANSACTION
* IKANG HEALTHCARE GROUP - ‍IK HEALTHCARE INVESTMENT LIMITED WILL ACQUIRE CO FOR CASH CONSIDERATION OF $41.20 PER CLASS A SHARE OR CLASS C SHARE OF CO
* IKANG HEALTHCARE GROUP - ‍IK HEALTHCARE INVESTMENT LIMITED WILL BE BENEFICIALLY OWNED BY SPONSORS, LEE LIGANG ZHANG, AND BOQUAN HE
* IKANG HEALTHCARE GROUP INC - ‍CASH CONSIDERATION OPTION OF $41.20 PER CLASS A SHARE OR CLASS C SHARE OF COMPANY OR US$20.60 PER ADS OF CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
